title: Return creation request data transfer object
description: Return-token data transfer object is used as request body for Register Return. See https://developers.pay-cex.io/api/#register-return

returnClientId.title: Optional. Client-side return identifier.
returnClientId.description: It may used to prevent duplicate returns.

returnClientTag.title: Any client's tag
returnClientTag.description: API clients may save here any related data.

risks.title: Set of risk flags
risks.description: These flags are used as warning to prevent potential losses by human-factor actions. Like enter wrong address, etc...

userFeeFactor.title: User's fee (factor)
userFeeFactor.description: User's fee (factor) is a stringified decimal value in range [0.0..1.0]. The value shown - how many percent of fee will be charged for an user. Example: value = 0.0 - merchant will pay all fee; value = 0.425 - user will pay 42.5% of fee and merchant will pay 57.5% of fee; value = 1.0 - user will pay all fee.

currency.title: Currency code of the account (like 'BTC', 'ETH', etc).

returnAddress.title: User's return address
returnAddress.description: User's return address is a target address for return operation.
